resp = client.search(
    index="product-index",
    query={
        "script_score": {
            "query": {
                "bool": {
                    "filter": {
                        "range": {
                            "price": {
                                "gte": 1000
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            },
            "script": {
                "source": "cosineSimilarity(params.queryVector, 'product-vector') + 1.0",
                "params": {
                    "queryVector": [
                        -0.5,
                        90,
                        -10,
                        14.8,
                        -156
                    ]
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
